title: Cauliflower 'Couscous' Salad

preparations.content: Cut dates into strips and slice spring onions then place both in a large serving bowl.
Place yellow pepper, red pepper and red onion in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 4<b>. Add to serving bowl with dates.

Place leaves of 6 sprigs of mint, cauliflower florets, oil, vinegar, lemon zest, cinnamon, chilli flakes and salt in mixing bowl then, without measuring cup, chop <b>15 sec/speed 5<b> while stirring with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid. Add to serving bowl and combine well.
Garnish with leaves from remaining mint sprig before serving.

hintsAndTricks: An ideal Thermomix salad, fast and unusual. This will surprise your guests.
The cauliflower is crushed so that the salad looks like a couscous salad.
